component.name: ToggleWatchlistTask
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ToggleWatchlistTask:Init"
m.top.functionName = "RunTask"
End Sub
Sub RunTask()
print "ToggleWatchlistTask:RunTask"
if m.top.add then result = GetData("/Media/AddToWatchlist/" + m.top.id, m.global.profileToken) else result = DeleteData("/Media/DeleteFromWatchlist/" + m.top.id, m.global.profileToken) end if
if result.statusCode = 401 then m.global.loggedOut = true
End Sub
